name: SkinSensationPainOrPinprickVibrationTemperature
title: Skin Sensation (Pain or Pinprick, Vibration, Temperature)
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of Skin sensation (pain/pinprick, vibration, temperature).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the person's ability to detect temperature, pain and/or vibration on the skin.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Skin Sensation (Pain or Pinprick, Vibration, Temperature).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Skin Sensation (Pain or Pinprick, Vibration, Temperature).)

contains.display: Skin desensitized to pain or pressure [Minimum Data Set]
